summary: A hitman tries to retire, but a beautiful thief may change his plans.
cast: Bill Nighy|Emily Blunt|Rupert Grint|Rupert Everett|Eileen Atkins|Martin Freeman|Gregor Fisher|Geoff Bell|Rory Kinnear|Duncan Duff|Graham Seed|James O'Donnell|George Rainsford|Alexis Rodney|Sia Berkeley|Jenny Crosdale|Philip Battley|Neil D'Souza|Adrian Schiller|Jonathan Lynn|Stephanie Lammond
title: Blanco escurridizo
